overview: Two couples cross their lives as neighbors in the same building, one of them can no longer stand her husband who, in addition to mistreating her, cheats on her and is a compulsive gambler. She, determined to take her life from her, throws herself off her balcony into the void, being rescued by her neighbor who heals her wounds and pampers her sexually, restoring her joy for living.
title: La más sabrosa del barrio
